alert.note: Alert for Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 08 at 1:03PM MST until December 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of a half inch to 2 inches in the lower valleys and 3 to 5 inches in the mountain valleys. * WHERE...Baker County and the Treasure Valley of Oregon and Idaho. * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions along all transportation corridors in the advised area. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Morning temperatures will support rapid snow accumulation on road surfaces.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Treasure Valley; Owyhee Mountains; Upper Treasure Valley
